name: aerospace-window-switcher
title: Aerospace Window Switcher
description: Simple app switcher designed to be used with Aerospace tiling window manager for MacOS
author: rabeez

commands.name: aerospace-switcher
commands.title: Switch Between Apps
commands.description: Select one of the open windows to switch to it. Filtering is possible based on both window title and app name.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
